text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Regulated Professions (Health and Social

title: 1. This Order may be cited as the Regulated Professions (Health and Social
heading: 2. The 5th day of September 2025 is appointed as the day on which section
text_raw:
2. The 5th day of September 2025 is appointed as the day on which section 
109, in so far as it is not already in operation, of the Regulated Professions 
(Health and Social Care) (Amendment) Act 2020 (No. 16 of 2020) shall come 
into operation. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

3 September, 2025. 

JENNIFER CARROLL MACNEILL, 

Minister for Health. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 5th September, 2025. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [420] 3

title: 1. This Order may be cited as the Regulated Professions (Health and Social
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

This Order appoints 5th September 2025 as the day on which section 109, in so 
far as it is not already in operation, of the Regulated Professions (Health and 
Social Care) (Amendment) Act 2020 (No. 16 of 2020) shall come into operation. 

The provision being commenced amends the Medical Practitioners Act 2007 to 
provide additional grounds for complaint under section 57 of that Act. 

 
 
 
 
 
 4 [420]
